Chauncey Billups scored 31 points and Carmelo Anthony had 14 to help the Denver Nuggets spoil Allen Iverson 's return to Philadelphia with a 93-83 win over the 76ers on Monday night. I just felt like I was back home, Allen Iverson said.`` It was deja vu. Just a real good feeling. The fans made it hard on me because they made me more nervous than I already was.'' joked that only his suicide would convince Mike Pence Will Not Run for President Indiana announced Thursday that he would not be a Republican candidate for president in 2012, but he left the door open to running for governor. In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana, Mr. Mike Pence wrote in a letter to supporters.`` We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012.'' Donald Rumsfeld provides some`` puckish'' and`` acidic'' observations about former colleagues, according to Toby Harnden in the Telegraph. Any readers expecting a mea culpa from the famously cocksure Donald Rumsfeld will be disappointed but nonetheless this is a`` clearly written work that attempts to cut through a number of myths to give a measured account of how things happened and why''. draw down U.S. troops shortly after the 2003 invasion of Iraq was`` the most important failure in the execution of the war.''
